arn.description: The ARN of the bot alias.

conversationLogs.description: The settings that determine how Amazon Lex uses conversation logs for the alias. Attributes are documented under conversation_logs.

createdDate.description: The date that the bot alias was created.

description.description: A description of the alias. Must be less than or equal to 200 characters in length.

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date that the bot alias was updated. When you create a resource, the creation date and the last updated date are the same.

name.description: The name of the alias. The name is not case sensitive. Must be less than or equal to 100 characters in length.

description.description: A description of the alias. Must be less than or equal to 200 characters in length.

name.description: The name of the alias. The name is not case sensitive. Must be less than or equal to 100 characters in length.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering BotAlias resources.
